Series.SeriesName: How to Get Away with Murder
Series.Overview: Annalise Keating is a brilliant, charismatic and seductive professor of defense law, who teaches a class called 'How to Get Away with Murder'. Unexpectedly, she and her students end up having to apply practical knowledge from the course when they become entangled in a murder plot that not only shakes the entire university to the core but also changes the course of each of their lives.
